  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(CampList campList)
      Constructor for camp
      Parameters:
      campList - Camplist

    • Camp

      public Camp(CampList campList, String campName, String startDate, String endDate, String closingDate, String faculty, String location, int attendeeSlot, int committeeSlot, String detail, boolean visibility, String staffInCharge)
      Parameters:
      campList - The camplist
      campName - The camp's name
      startDate - The start date of the camp
      endDate - The end date of the camp
      closingDate - The closing registration date
      faculty - The faculty of the camp
      location - The location of the camp
      attendeeSlot - The amount of attendee that can register for the camp
      committeeSlot - The amount of committee that can register for the camp
      detail - The details about the camp
      visibility - The visibility of the camp to students
      staffInCharge - The staff that created the camp and is in charge of the camp.
